name: A Loyal Squire
description:
Made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Theme: You're not alone

Description:

Your king sends You, Sir Solovar, on a dangerous quest, but do not worry! Your loyal squire will be here to help you overcome every obstacle that will stand in Your way.

Controls:

AWSD - movement

SPACE - jump

E (near the squire) - pick the squire up

LMB (while holding) - aim and throw the squire

T - respawn at previous checkpoint

Q - pause game

M - mute/unmute audio
